credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a console table
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and wash, yellow watercolor, on white laid paper
description: At left, frontal view of console table, covered urn draped with a floral garland on stretcher below. Scale plan is seen below table. At right, another suggestion for overleaf and support of table top.
name: drawing
